rooms.name: Main Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entry with ramp and open design for ease of movement. Vastu principles ensure the door faces east.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Central living space with natural light from south windows. Designed with accessible seating and wide walkways.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen. Vastu compliant by aligning with the center of the house.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional layout with modern appliances. Wide counters and accessible design for wheelchair users.

rooms.name: Utility Room/Storage
rooms.description: Essential storage area near the kitchen to reduce clutter.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Accessible bedroom with easy access corridors for a guest. Vastu oriented north.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master suite with en-suite bathroom and ample closet space. Positioned as per Vastu recommendations.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Soundproofed entertainment area integrated into the living space. Designed for family viewing with wheelchair accessibility.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: Two-car garage with easy access from main entrance and dedicated storage compartments.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: Accessible bathroom with grab bars and non-slip surfaces.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact design with accessibility features for guests.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible ramp adjacent to staircase with handrails and non-slip surfaces.

rooms.name: Study/Workspace
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace with ample natural light. Designed for remote work and study.

openings.description: Open balcony for fresh air and relaxation.
